title: Arch Grad Prog - mysterious sans
content:
Spotted this logo on this website [http://inhousedesign.co.nz/project/arch-grad-prog/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725042411/http:/inhousedesign.co.nz/project/arch-grad-prog/ "http://inhousedesign.co.nz/project/arch-grad-prog/")  
Can't find the typeface.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725042411im_/http:/typophile.com/files/archgradprog_5379.jpg)
author: pjessi

comments.content: [Graphik](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725042411/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fcommercialtype.com/typefaces/graphik) by Christian Schwartz for Commercial Type

WhatFont says Futura Plus W08 but the image but the letterforms look more like Neuzeit-s  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/neuzeit-s/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725042411/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/neuzeit-s/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/neuzeit-s/") if it had a heavy weight.  
Don

Good find Ryuk. Here is the correct link [https://commercialtype.com/typefaces/graphik/black](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725042411/https:/commercialtype.com/typefaces/graphik/black "https://commercialtype.com/typefaces/graphik/black")  
Don
